'''Nina Gold''' is the London [[Wikipedia:Casting (performing arts)|casting director]] for ''[[Game of Thrones (TV series)|Game of Thrones]]''.

Apart from casting the various actors for the show, she has worked on numerous other shows and movies, including ''Hott Fuzz'', ''The King's Speech'', ''Prometheus'', ''Les MisĂŠrables'', and ''Star Wars: Episode VII''. She was also the casting director for the previous [[HBO]] show, ''Rome''.

She lives in northwest London, England.
